name: West Virginia
title: Lack of state, federal funding leads to WV’s Raze program’s elimination, leaders say
description: Raze, a youth-led program that, for more than 20 years aimed at preventing youth smoking and vaping in West Virginia, will end soon because of state and federal funding cuts, the organization said on May 1, 2025. The program will run out of money June 30, 2025. Leaders have started alerting participating middle and high schools and adult advisors that there will be no more support for the program after that, said Chaste Barclay, director of health promotions for the American Lung Association, which supports the program.
